mapper.select: select id, login,name, password, role, status, last_log_on from t_admins where id = #{id}
select id, login, name, password, role, status, last_log_on from t_admins
select id, login, name, password, role, status, last_log_on from t_admins where name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')) or login LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{name},'%'))
mapper.insert: insert into t_admins(id, login, name, password, role, status, last_log_on) values(#{id}, #{login}, #{name}, #{password},#{role} ,#{status},#{last_log_on})
mapper.update: update t_admins set login = #{login} ,name = #{name},password = #{password},role = #{role},status = #{status},last_log_on = #{last_log_on} where id = #{id}
